resources.string: There is no game saved. If you can read this message, something is likely broken.

Find as many words as you can as quickly as possible. Touch the screen and move your finger to adjacent squares to spell out words. You have three minutes to find as many words as possible.


Scoring: 
On 4x4 boards, words must be at least three letters long. On 5x5 boards, words must be at least four letters long. Words that have three or four letters are worth one point. Longer words are worth more points. Proper nouns are not counted.
